name: Fast and Happy - Fun drag racing game
name_original: Fast and Happy - Fun drag racing game
description:
Fast and Happy a fun speed game for kids, tap the happy face button as fast as you can to get going.

Tune your car and accelerate your way to victory, try to find the right balance between power and grip while staying in your class

Every vehicle is competitive and there's no "premium" upgrades. It's all about your skill and dedication.

Features:

- 20 cars with completely different steering models.
- Leaderboards where you can establish your domination.
- Tune your car.
- Funny vehicles.

If you have any questions about the game - e-mail us, we will answer any question!
